title: NY Appeals Court Overturns Harvey Weinstein's Sex Crimes Conviction | Video | 2news.com
text: The New York Court of Appeals has overturned the sex crimes conviction against Harvey Weinstein, the powerful Hollywood producer whose downfall symbolized the #MeToo movement.
